publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3339# Euan Robson: South of Scotland Structural Funds—That the Parliament welcomes the investment in Roxburgh and Berwickshire, the Borders and the south of Scotland from EU structural funding, such as at Springwood Park in Kelso and at Ettrick Riverside in Selkirk; notes that the current round of such funding ends in March 2006, and believes that the south of Scotland has a clear case for continuing investment to support its economy and communities.
S2M-3339# South of Scotland Structural Funds (lodged on 23 September 2005) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3339# Euan Robson: South of Scotland Structural Funds—That the Parliament welcomes the investment in Roxburgh and Berwickshire, the Borders and the South of Scotland from European Union structural funding, such as at Springwood Park in Kelso and at Ettrick Riverside in Selkirk; notes that the current round of such funding ends in March 2006, and believes that the south of Scotland has a clear case for continuing investment to support its economy and communities. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Chris Ballance*, Christine Grahame*, Dr Elaine Murray*
S2M-3339# South of Scotland Structural Funds (lodged on 23 September 2005) Phil Gallie*, Jeremy Purvis*, Nora Radcliffe*, Derek Brownlee*
S2M-3339# South of Scotland Structural Funds (lodged on 23 September 2005) John Swinburne*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
